merge_before_transcript: rachel: Okay, look, Ross, I realise that my Father is difficult, but that’s why you have got to be the bigger man here.
ross_transcript: Look sweetie, I could be the bigger man, I could be the biggest man, I could be a big, huge, giant man, and it still wouldn’t make any difference, except that I could pick your Father up and say ‘Like me! Like me tiny doctor!’
